spec_data.Name: perl-String-ShellQuote
spec_data.Description:
This package contains a Perl module and a command line utility which
are useful for quoting strings which are going to pass through the
shell or a shell-like object.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:04:53 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module for quoting strings for passing through the shell
